obfuscation: ﻿1. Introduction English is one inside the most spoken languages, in globe. There are many variety spread around whole world, in which British English also American English are two biggest groups.
original: ﻿1. Introduction  English is one of the most spoken languages in the world. There are many varieties spread around the whole world, of which British English and American English are the two largest groups.

obfuscation: Many youth people today chose to spend a year or several oof United States to either studies or work. Since we Swedes have been taught English of school since the 4th grade language should not cause any big problems.
